Events at Monkey’s Uncle Tavern
Karaoke Nights: Wednesday, Saturday and Sunday at 9:30 p.m.
Monkey’s Uncle Tavern has received recognition for many years when it comes to Karaoke Nights on Wednesday, Saturday and Sunday each week. We received first and second place awards from Folio Weekly Magazine for Best Karaoke Night in Jax! Join DJ Austin Williams to check out the local talent on stage, or give it a shot yourself! See some past contestants on
Austin’s Youtube Channel
. Prizes are awarded to the top-three contestants!
Monday Nights: Music Trivia at 7:30 p.m. - Bingo at 9 p.m
Have some fun during music trivia, which challenges your memory of top songs in every genre, or go for prizes during our Monday Night Bingo — with prizes awarded to winners every week!
Trivia Night: Every Tuesday at 7:30 p.m.
Every Tuesday, friends get together to test their knowledge on Trivia Night, with prizes awarded to the highest scoring teams!
Pool Tournament: Every Wednesday at 7:30 p.m.
Bring your pool cue, or use one of ours, and join us every Wednesday evening as players enjoy our expanded bar and pool room for fun and competition. This is a public pool tournament, so anyone can compete and bring their best game!
New on Thursdays: Game Show Loco Interactive Trivia at 7:30 p.m.
Live Music Every Thursday and Friday night from 9:30 p.m. 'til close
Game Show Loco mixes trivia, Wheel of Fortune, What’s that Song and much more, so kick off your Thursdays with this new, fun multi-game of trivia and chance!
We also feature the best local bands live every Thursday and Friday night from 9:30 p.m. ’til close. And in the spring and summer months, we host ‘Island Music Sundays’ with live music from 4 to 8 p.m.
Be sure to visit our
Facebook page
to check out our weekly line up of bands.
Saturday - Live Music
Want to get an early start on your Saturday night? Then come listen to the band with live music from 3 to 7 p.m.
(We love live bands…and we sometimes book them on Sundays, typically performing from 4 to 8 p.m.)
To see if we have a band lined up this Sunday, visit our Facebook Page
.
Like our Facebook Page to receive updates on What is happening at Monkey's Uncle Tavern, live music, special events and all of the excitement planned.
